briefTitle: An Extension Study to Examine the Safety and Tolerability of a New Drug in Patients With Symptoms of Overactive Bladder (OAB).
officialTitle: An International Phase 3, Randomized, Double-Blind, Active (Tolterodine)-Controlled Multicenter Extension Study to Evaluate the Long-Term Safety and Efficacy of Vibegron in Patients With Symptoms of Overactive Bladder
summary: This study is designed to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and efficacy of vibegron administered once daily in participants with OAB for up to 52 weeks.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With the Indicated Type of Treatment-emergent Adverse Event
